data.title: Sarah Clarke (24, The Twilight Movies) by Reliving My Youth
data.meta_description: Stream Sarah Clarke (24, The Twilight Movies) by Reliving My Youth on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2020-06-03T15:37:38Z

Noel catches up with Sarah Clarke. The actress is best known for her role as Nina Myers on 24. Sarah talks about getting the role and meeting her husband, Xander Berkeley, on set. Sarah had roles in the Twilight movies and Bosch. She also had a recurring role in Xander's show, The Booth at the End.
